entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 except minus 14 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
